attributes.action: Give Britain back to the British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain should be for the British. The immigration status is seriously out of control. The money, the jobs, the industries and the pride of this Country is fastly falling into the hands of the foreigners who come to this country just to get away from their own land. Britain needs to shut the doors on all foreigners attempting to gain access to our Country so we can sort the mess out that Government has caused for us all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
